title: Greek pulled duck burger with spiced duck popcorn, apple and peach slaw, pickles and watercress
description: A spiced, zesty marinade for this slow-cooked duck makes delicious burgers, served with fruit slaw flavoured with a dash of ouzo.
ingredients: 1 head of garlic, halved width ways
1 whole duck, back bone removed, spatchcocked
1 Granny Smith apples, cut into thin strips (on a mandolin)
sheep’s milk cheese, such as a truffled pecorino, sliced
